metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16492 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in module extend <2.0.2, ~<3.0.2 that allows an attacker to inject arbitrary properties onto Object.prototype.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-16492` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-extend - 3.0.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-extend package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-1').
